about.aboutText1: Hello! My name is Evgenia Chernyavskaya and I'm a front-end developer. In my work I use HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. I can turn design layouts into responsive and intuitive interfaces and develop web application functionality to meet business needs.
about.aboutText2: Before development, I worked as a journalist for many years and became a master of sports in soft skills: I get along with anyone, have creative thinking and work well in a team.
about.skillsText1:
Confident knowledge: 
HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, React Router, Figma.
about.skillsText2:
Familiar with technology: 
TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Webpack, Vite, Node.js, Nodemailer, Express, Next.js.
about.experienceText3:
- Thinking through the project architecture in compliance with customer requirements: JavaScript/React.
- Creating a web application design in Figma.
- Adapting the interface layout for mobile devices CSS/Sass.
- Backend development: connected the Supabase database to the site via API.
- Adding the function of processing orders from customers using Node JS, Nodemaile.
about.educationText2: Udemy. Complete course on JavaScript + React - from scratch to results.
about.educationText4: Perm State University. Youth Leadership Practices.

project1.title: Lucciola books
project1.description: Website for an online book store and library operating in Tbilisi, Georgia

project2.title: Hangman Game
project2.description: A game familiar from childhood, where the player needs to guess the word by choosing the letters correctly
